metadata.description: Name of the RDSH collection to update
URI for the template VHD to use for RDSH instances. For example, https://rdsstorage.blob.core.windows.net/vhds/MyWindowServerOSImage.vhd
A unique designator representing update iteration; newly created RDSH instances will have their names in the form: 'rdsh-<index><iteration>'
The size of the RDSH virtual machines
Timeout before forced user logoff from old RDSH instances
The FQDN of the AD domain. For example contoso.com
The name of administrator in the existing RDS deployment
Storage account name;  has to be same storage account where template VHD resides (as specified by 'rdshTemplateImageUri' parameter).

protectedSettings.commandToExecute: [concat( 'powershell -noninteractive -executionpolicy unrestricted -file Script.ps1 -collection "', parameters('rdshCollectionName'),'" -iteration "', parameters('rdshUpdateIteration'),'" -nServers ', parameters('rdshNumberOfInstances'),' -nTimeoutMinutes ', parameters('userLogoffTimeoutInMinutes'),' >> script.log 2>&1' )]
